string.name: cat_docked_toolbar_description
string.description: Body text describing the Docked Toolbar component within the design system [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: The docked toolbar is pinned to the top or bottom and can be used to display contextual actions relevant to the body content or the specific page.
